entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢 15 thoughts from a developer working 1.5 years in crypto / blockchain / web3 - Most ppl don't care about NFTs as they're widely used today - Most ppl will not (should not?) pay to transact in most cases - Points of centralization will temporarily be needed to provide better UX

entry.title: RT Cami (🐱, ⛽️): Ways to support women in crypto instead of pandering on Twitter: -Introduce women colleagues in group settings -Interject when m...
entry.summary: RT Cami (🐱, ⛽️) Ways to support women in crypto instead of pandering on Twitter: -Introduce women colleagues in group settings -Interject when men talk over us -Invite us to events but NOT to talk about being a woman -Reach out to @womenbuildweb3 @BoysClubCrypto @She__Fi @she_256 for candidates

RT AlgoveraAI: We're absolutely thrilled to welcome @wise_Tyy onto our team as Community Manager. Ty has much experience in this role at @developer_da...
entry.summary: RT AlgoveraAI We're absolutely thrilled to welcome @wise_Tyy onto our team as Community Manager. Ty has much experience in this role at @developer_dao & @edenprotocolxyz. We love the way that he thinks about onboarding & engaging community members. So excited to see what we can build together! Ty: Happy to share that I've joined @AlgoveraAI as a Community Manager! 🔥 Super excited to decentralize AI by merging data science with web3 and build an epic community 🤝 Big thanks to @developer_dao & @edenprotocolxyz 🙏
